test_case.title: User successfully Sign In
pre_condition: User has an account on Walmart.com
User has signed in to their email address
User opens browser, for example Google Chrome

steps.expected_result: "Sign in or create account" pop-up is displayed.

steps.action: User clicks on "Sign in or create account" button
steps.expected_result: User is redirected to a new page with an "Email Address" field and a "Continue" button.
The user's email address is displayed.
User sees a detailed message including various elements related to sign-in options.
User sees masking of their password.
User is redirected to a new page to enter a verification code.

steps.action: User receives an email from walmart.com with the verification code.
steps.expected_result: User successfully receives the email with the verification code.

steps.action: User opens the email and copies the 6-digit verification code.
steps.expected_result: User successfully copies the verification code.

steps.action: User pastes the verification code into the 6 boxes fields.
steps.expected_result: User sees the verification code in the boxes.
User successfully logs in to their account.
